__e: You know, we were about to name one of them Marvin's godparent, and... I can't tell you what's going on in any of their lives.
um, Lily has to work, so Marvin and I will come visit you for a whole week, and I-I'll see if I can get a last-minute flight.
and you said yes and we came over here to meet little Marvin and that's everything!
